text: Gurgen Dalibaltayan (; 5 June 1926 - 1 September 2015) was an Armenian military commander. He was the Chief of General Staff of Armenian Armed Forces during the Battle of Shusha on 8-9 May 1992. The battle took place during the Nagorno-Karabakh War. Dalibaltayan was born in Bogdanovka, Javakheti, Georgian SSR (present-day Ninotsminda, Samtskhe-Javakheti, Georgia). He was married to Shushanik Dalibaltayan (n√©e Khachatryan). They have two children, a daughter Varduhi (b. 1952) and a son Varazdat (b. 1954). Dalibaltayan died on 1 September 2015 in Yerevan, aged 89. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Armenian generals Category:Soviet military people
title: Gurgen Dalibaltayan
